title: Sync selected opportunity symbol across Dashboard tabs

requirements.summary: Unify Dashboard symbol selection across Opportunity Recognition, Market (Market Turn Monitor), and 3m Checklist tabs with a shared default of BTCUSDT.
acceptanceCriteria: When a user selects a symbol in Opportunity Recognition, the Market tab selector value updates to that symbol and MarketTrendMonitor renders using that symbol.
When a user selects a symbol in Opportunity Recognition, the Checklist tab selector value updates to that symbol and ChecklistSignalsPanel3m renders using that symbol.
When a user changes the symbol using the selector in the Market tab, the Checklist tab uses the same symbol (and vice versa).
The shared symbol defaults to "BTCUSDT" on first load (matching current behavior).

file_operations.description: Replace the separate marketSymbol/checklistSymbol states with a single shared selectedSymbol state (defaulting to "BTCUSDT") used by both Market and Checklist tabs. Wire OrderBookSymbolSelector in both tabs to read/write the shared selectedSymbol, and pass selectedSymbol to MarketTrendMonitor and ChecklistSignalsPanel3m so both render from the same source of truth.

requirements.summary: Allow OpportunityRecognitionPanel to notify the Dashboard when an opportunity symbol is selected so the shared symbol updates automatically while preserving the existing details dialog behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: OpportunityRecognitionPanel accepts a prop (e.g., onSelectSymbol(symbol: string)) that is called with the clicked opportunity row’s symbol.
Clicking an opportunity row still opens the details dialog as it does today, and also updates the shared Dashboard symbol state to the clicked symbol.

file_operations.description: Add an optional symbol-selection callback prop (e.g., onSelectSymbol) and invoke it with the clicked row’s symbol when a user selects an opportunity, while preserving current behavior of opening the details dialog (including the Info button path).

Pass a callback into OpportunityRecognitionPanel that updates the shared selectedSymbol state when a row is selected, ensuring the Market and Checklist tab selectors and rendered panels stay in sync without adding new tabs/routes.
